value: Condorcet: Bonjour, mon amis and welcome to the french revolution. Your name is ||name||, isn't it? And you've got a very nice ||creature||, even if it's not that strong yet. We currently are in Paris at the end of the 18th century and you have to help us to fight against the injustice of the nobility during the french revolution! Let's go around and check if there are any citizens who need help.
Oh, look, there are two children who are in trouble. A wild ... attacks them. You have to protect them, hurry up!
